downloadDescription: Host Integration Server 2016 Client installation packages
detailsSection: Host Integration Server 2016 Client enables applications to access IBM mainframe and midrange systems via the SNA Gateway in Host Integration Server 2016.
systemRequirementsSection:
This release is supported on the following operating systems:
  • Windows 10
  • Windows 8.1
  • Windows Server 2016
  • Windows Server 2012 R2
  • Virtualization with Azure and Hyper-V
This release requires the following version of the Microsoft .NET Framework:
  • Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
